author: VNExplorer
title: La FIFA le prohíbe al Santos realizar transferencias por una denuncia del técnico Bustos
text:
La FIFA le prohíbe al Santos realizar transferencias por una denuncia del técnico Bustos
São Paulo, 1 feb (EFE).- La FIFA le prohibió al Santos realizar transferencias hasta que se resuelva la situación laboral con el extécnico argentino Fabián Bustos, según informó este jueves el club brasileño.
En un comunicado, el Santos indicó que fue informado por la FIFA sobre el castigo conocido en inglés como ‘transfer ban’, una medida administrativa que le impide a los clubes el fichaje y la inscripción de nuevos jugadores por el impago de transferencias internacionales.
La decisión, detalló el Santos, se deriva de una demanda interpuesta por Bustos, actualmente en el club peruano Universitario y quien trabajó en el equipo brasileño entre marzo y julio de 2022.
El entrenador reclama una indemnización de seis millones de reales (unos 1,22 millones de dólares) por la rescisión unilateral de su contrato.
Después de los recursos presentados por el club, la FIFA y el Tribunal Arbitral Deportivo (TAS) decidieron reducir el importe de la indemnización a cuatro millones de reales (unos 810.000 dólares).
Luego de la notificación y para “evitar mayores daños a la imagen del club”, el Departamento Jurídico del Santos comenzó a negociar un acuerdo con el exentrenador, apuntó el comunicado.
“Las negociaciones avanzan satisfactoriamente, lo que indica una rápida solución al problema”, que se produjo bajo la gestión del expresidente Andrés Rueda, puntualizó el Santos, que este año disputará la segunda división tras su descenso en 2023.
(c) Agencia EFE

author: @dallasnews
title: Brokerage reports ‘legendary home sales’ by Alex Perry
text:
Alex Perry ended the year once again as the No. 1 luxury agent in Dallas, closing more than $300 million in sales for the third year in a row. For Perry, 2023 also was the second year in which he ranked as the No. 1 luxury agent in Dallas and across Texas, according to RealTrends in partnership with The Wall Street Journal . RealTrends names the top real estate sales professionals in the country each spring. Perry ranks 33rd in the country.
Advertisement As the top-selling agent at Allie Beth Allman & Associates , a boutique brokerage that sells the most luxury homes in Dallas, Perry has closed more than $1 billion in sales since 2020.
Advertisement “It’s just absolutely amazing that Alex Perry individually has sold over $300 million for three years,” said Allie Beth Allman & Associates president and CEO Keith Conlon . “Although the past year had its challenges, he again performed at the top of his game and continued to get the deals done.”

author: AFP
title: Ruud rolls into Geneva final - Sports - Business Recorder
text: GENEVA: Casper Ruud downed Novak Djokovic’s conqueror Tomas Machac on Saturday to win a third Geneva title and head into the French Open with a trophy in his racquet bag. Norwegian Ruud, the world number seven, beat 44th-ranked Czech Machac 7-5, 6-3 in an hour and 47 minutes. Second seed Ruud is at home on the Parc des Eaux-Vives clay, having won the Geneva title in 2021 and 2022. Ruud was the runner-up in the last two French Opens, and a third Geneva title gives the 25-year-old a timely boost as he makes the journey to Paris. Nobody has won more matches on the ATP tour this year than Ruud. Swiatek, Osaka in potential French Open 2nd round clash “Another tough match,” said Ruud. “I’m sorry for Tomas. “I think he played a great match. He definitely deserved to win the first set. “It’s been a very good season so far.” The 28-man Geneva tournament serves as a warm-up before the French Open, the second of the year’s four Grand Slams, which begins on Sunday. It was Ruud’s second match of the day, having beaten Italy’s in-form Flavio Cobolli 1-6, 6-1, 7-6 (7/4) in a roller coaster semi-final. The contest between Ruud and Cobolli, on a career-high ranking of 56, was meant to take place on Friday evening but was called off due to persistent rain. “I’ll just take a shower, rest, have some lunch and then start again,” Ruud said after his first win of the day. World number one Djokovic took a late wildcard to play in Geneva in a bid to reverse an alarming dip in form ahead of Roland-Garros, where he has won three times. But the 24-time Grand Slam champion was left feeling “worried” about his French Open title defence after falling 6-4, 0-6, 6-1 to Machac in the Geneva semi-finals on Friday. For Czech number two Machac, it was the biggest win of his career and propelled the 23-year-old into his maiden tour-level final, which will shoot him up to a career-high 34 in the world rankings. The last Czech to reach the Geneva final was Tomas Smid in 1987. In the French Open first round, Ruud will face Brazilian qualifier Felipe Meligeni Alves. Machac will face Portuguese number one Nuno Borges.

author: Industria e Finanza
title: Volkswagen, da dicembre rischio scioperi | Quattroruote.it
text:
La settimana scorsa si è tenuto il terzo incontro tra il gruppo Volkswagen e i rappresentanti dei lavoratori, per cercare di trovare un accordo tra le parti e scongiurare la chiusura degli stabilimenti e i licenziamenti , già più volte indicati come le uniche soluzioni possibili da parte della dirigenza del gruppo. Il tavolo si è concluso con un nulla di fatto e per questo motivo il sindacato IG Metall fa sapere ai suoi iscritti, tramite un volantino distribuito nella giornata del 29 novembre, che a questo punto gli scioperi sono non solo “possibili, ma necessari”.
Stop a oltranza. All’apertura della crisi i lavoratori avevano accettato la richiesta della Volkswagen di evitare mobilitazioni fino alla fine di novembre, nella speranza di trovare un accordo ed evitare blocchi alla produzione. Così non è stato e da lunedì le fabbriche potrebbero incrociare le braccia. Qualora il prossimo giro di negoziati dovesse rivelarsi nuovamente infruttuoso, i sindacati non escludono scioperi a oltranza: “La Volkswagen si renderà conto al tavolo delle trattative quanto a lungo durerà, e quanto duro sarà lo scontro con i sindacati. Tutta la forza lavoro in Germania è pronta allo sciopero”, si legge ancora nel volantino.
